title: Help with identifying bitmapped script font
content:
Wondering if anyone knows the name of the bitmapped script font in this scan?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170650im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/T2_4682.jpg)

 [‹ Ball-terminal slab serif with personality](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170650/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43031 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help with san serif type ID... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170650/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43020 "Go to next forum topic")
author: terigardiner

comments.content: The font is Superscript by [Superlooper](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015170650/http:/www.superlooper.de/). Be prepared for an irritating website. Once you work your way to the fonts, Superscript is the third selection from the top.
